headline: Allot Ltd (ALLT) Q1 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: A Return to Growth with Strategic Partnerships
summary: Allot Ltd (ALLT) reports a 6% revenue increase and strengthens its position with key partnerships, despite challenges in service launches and market reliance.

headline: Verizon to invest $5 billion in US small business suppliers over next 5 years
summary: The investment program would help create a pipeline of business for these suppliers from Verizon and other large corporations, the company said.  Verizon joins several big tech companies that have announced billions in investments in the U.S., as President Donald Trump's administration has pushed for local manufacturing.  Apple has said it would spend $500 billion in U.S. investments in the next four years, while IBM will invest $150 billion over the next five years.

headline: Verizon announces a $5B commitment to continue investing in America and supporting small businesses
summary: What you need to know: Verizon announces a substantial $5 billion commitment over the next five years with the launch of a new Small Business Supplier Accelerator.Verizon Small Business Digital Ready launched a new grant cycle where eligible small businesses can apply for $10,000 grants (open until June 30, 2025). headline: Verizon to speak at MoffettNathanson conference May 15
summary: NEW YORK, May 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Sowmyanarayan Sampath, executive vice president for Verizon (NYSE, Nasdaq: VZ), and CEO for Verizon Consumer, is scheduled to speak at the MoffettNathanson Media, Internet & Communications Conference on Thursday, May 15, at 8:00 a.m. ET. His remarks will be webcast, with access instructions available on Verizon’s Investor Relations website, www.verizon.com/about/investors. headline: The Smartest High-Yield Dividend Stocks in Warren Buffett's "Secret Portfolio" to Buy Right Now
summary: Ares Capital offers an ultrahigh dividend yield and a history of delivering market-beating total returns.  Duke Energy is a safe haven with solid growth opportunities.  Verizon Communications has increased its dividend for 18 consecutive years.
